name: Final Flames 2: Against the Dark World Crisis
name_original: Final Flames 2: Against the Dark World Crisis
description:
Final Flames 2 is a free arcade-style beat-em-up game that doesn't take itself too seriously.

What if a hero that saved the world many years ago suddenly turned evil?
What if that hero, was your best friend? Should you fight him? Heck yeah, you do! We can't just sacrifice the world like that!

Take a silly journey with four different characters including:
King: a ordinary swordsman with the power to control fire and explosions
Naira: a creepy, weeaboo stalker with a gun
Faliyos: a handicapped, ice-cold fist fighter
Alen: a disinterested Taekwondo student that somehow got dragged into the conflict

Each character has a different set of movesets and attributes that definitely requires a different playstyle for each.

Get creative with combos
This game is not limited to just a basic one button combo! Mix it up with the use of assist partner summons, skill attacks, smash attacks, aerial attacks, and unleash attacks.

You are not alone
In times of danger, not everyone has to be super heroes. Save citizens, and some might even help fight with you! Because you are fighting together with others, you are not limited to a single character to use. You can switch to any character at any time by using the SHIFT key.

UPDATES:

  • May 5, 2017 v1.0.0 - Full game released! Look forward to the extended story mode next month!
  • July 28, 2016 v0.2.0 - New character switching system. Less cringy dialogue. Many, many bug fixes including slowdowns on the Title screen. Some graphical and sound changes. Game now works with Windows 8.
